TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_smqaya, title = smqaya, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/smqaya} }

S.FORM: smqaya usa skura qsa cika ha, smqaya su bala, maymaw saku ini qbaq mtzyaw la, ihi usa nasal la,aki ini kznga tmasuq qu pincwaga mu.
smqaya osa skora qsa cika ha, smqaya so bala, maymaw sako ini qbaq mtzyaw la, ihi osa nasal la,aki ini kznga tmasoq qo pincwaga mo.
